concept.title: ITCQF certification
concept.shortdesc: International Technical Communication Qualifications Foundation is a certification program of technical communication which is based on international standards.

section.title: Training
section.p: ITCQF® Foundation Level training is a course which lasts for two days and can be held in class or online. It fully covers the content of the syllabus and supplements it with graphical summaries, practical examples and excercises.

section.title: Exams
section.p: ITCQF® exams are organized in a consistent way worldwide and are based on a precisely defined number of questions, distributed in accordance to the syllabus topics.

section.title: Materials
section.p: There are 3 PDF documents that can be downloaded: ITCQF® Overview, The value of techwriting, and Syllabus (version 2.0)

section.title: Community
section.p: ITCQF® partnership model offers three basic types of cooperation – board, accredited training providers and certification bodies.
